DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate whether neurofeedback delivered via functional magnetic resonance imaging signals can be used to train depressed patients to self-regulate emotion networks and whether this improves clinical symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Neurofeedback as a Treatment Tool for Depression
DOC.criteria: major depressive disorder (MDD) diagnosis stable antidepressant dose medication Other physical or psychiatric disorders Current substance abuse Current psychotherapy or other specific intervention Exclusion criteria applicable to MRI
